name: frequency-counter
description: Crawl a website, count the words and order them by frequency.
author: Jan Aagaard <jan@aagaard.net>

scripts.start: yarn install --frozen-lockfile && rimraf wwwroot && copyfiles --up 1 "src/*.{html,png}" wwwroot && concurrently --kill-others --names "TSC,SERVE" "tsc --watch" "serve wwwroot"
